links.*: Of the Voyage of Eärendil and the War of Wrath
The Tale of Years (The War of the Jewels)

wikitext.*:
{{ardayearheader|542|545|587|590|Second Age 1|Second Age 32|Second Age 40}}
* After the [[War of Wrath]], [[Morgoth]] is banished forever into the [[Void]] through the [[Door of Night]],<ref name="WJ">{{WJ|Years}}, p. 346</ref> which will be guarded by [[Eärendil|Eärendil the Mariner]] until the coming of the [[Dagor Dagorath]].<ref name="Quenta">{{S|Earendil}}</ref>
* The [[Host of the Valar|Host of the West]] finally leaves sunken [[Beleriand]] and summons the [[Eldar]] to remove to [[Aman]] and settle on [[Tol Eressëa]], but [[Círdan]], [[Galadriel]] and [[Celeborn]], [[Celebrimbor]], [[Gil-galad]], and many [[Sindar]] elect to remain in [[Middle-earth]].<ref name="Quenta"/>
* As a gift to the [[Men]] of the Three Houses of the [[Edain]] (as well as the remaining [[Drúedain]] of Beleriand<ref>{{UT|12c}}, note 7, pp. 403-4</ref>) who had helped to defeat Morgoth, the [[Valar]] raise the island of [[Elenna]] amidst the [[Belegaer|Great Sea]]. Guided by the [[Star of Eärendil]], most of them start migrating there to establish a [[Númenor|new kindom]] removed from the dangers of Middle-earth.<ref name="LotR">{{App|Numenor}}, pp. 1034-5</ref><ref name="Numenor">{{S|IV}}</ref>
* The choice of the [[Half-elven]]: [[Elrond]] chooses to be of the [[Elves|Elven-kind]], and to remain in Middle-earth beside Gil-galad; while his brother [[Elros]] chooses to be a [[Gift of Ilúvatar|mortal Man]] and thus remains with the Edain.<ref name="Quenta"/><ref name="LotR"/><ref name="Numenor"/>
* The [[First Age]] ends.<ref name="WJ"/><ref name="Quenta"/><ref>{{App|B}}, p. 1085</ref>

{{references}}
